ComicInfo.Summary:
Overview
Don't mess with her, Officer Lewis is pissed off and ready to take the fight to the streets on this exclusive new work of brilliance by Juan Jose Ryp! Robocop is on his last legs, beat up, torn down, and damaged. But now he has to leap into his greatest fight yet and a far more sinister person takes over the indestructible Robocop 2, with plans of finishing off Robo once and for all! It is wall-to-wall action in this penultimate chapter of the most violent series of the year! This series continues to take the original Frank Miller Robocop story and faithfully adapt it into comics form by Steven Grant in order to capture every bit of the frenzied flavor that Miller wants with lusciously detailed artwork by Juan Jose Ryp.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-09 19:31:43. [CVDB128123]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Austin McKinley, Frank Miller, Greg Waller, Juan Jose Ryp
